page.title: 09Rhenigidale Hostel
page.content: The hostel in Rhenigidale is run by the Gatliff Trust. This Trust helps local people to provide an empty house for hostel accommodation, thus enabling all, but especally young people of limited means to explore this sparsely populated area of the Western Isles more easily. There are four trust houses in the Islands and they are open to everyone and are quite independent of the SYHA. The warden of the hostel in Rhenigidale is Roddy MacInnes although he does not live in the hostel. Facilities in these hostels are sparse with toilet facilities and running cold water only. Campbeds, blankets, calor gas, cooking utensils, cutlery and crockery are provided. In the hostel here there is a kitchen, toilet, sitting room/girl's dormitory and a boy's dormitory upstairs.
